thread.section_title: Keepkey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Keepkey | keepkey.com | 3 of 9
thread.title: Jim Thompson

author: Jim Thompson
title: Jim Thompson
text: KeepKey is an excellent device for storing and protecting your cryptocurrencies. The screen is larger and easier to read than its competitors and the interface is simple and intuitive. No matter how many nasty malware programs are on your desktop machine, KeepKey will prevent your keys from being pilfered. The best part, though, is the customer service. I contacted them twice for advice and they got back to me immediately with the perfect answer the first time. Extremely friendly as well! I would recommend KeepKey to anyone for the best protection for your funds.
